name: BetterLegacyLights
desc_en:
# BetterLegacyLights
The spiritual successor to BetterStaticLights. Choose the lights you want active on old, legacy environments.   
**NOTE:** This mod only works on V1/V2 environments! This means anything that existed in the game before OST V and the "Weave" environment. For a full environment list, check out the GitHub repository README.

## Dependencies
This mod was built to support AT LEAST Beat Saber v1.39.1 and above. Any older versions are not guaranteed to work!
- BSIPA v4.3.5+
- SiraUtil v3.1.14+
- BeatSaberMarkupLanguage v1.12.4+

## Features
- Choose which light sets you want active on legacy environments.
  - Each light set can be enabled or disabled; there are 5 light sets:
    * BackTop -> the lights around the player and the edges of the environment
    * RingLights -> the lights on the rotating rings of the environment
    * LeftLasers -> the left set of lasers/lights
    * RightLasers -> the right set of lasers/lights
    * BottomBackSide -> the lights on the edges of the highway, and oftentimes the arrow in the background of the environment
  - Each light set has a switch to change its color to the Left Saber color instead of the Right Saber.
  - Each light set has a brightness slider ranging from 0.1 to 1.
